kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Uvu-ovytvuhs, ihyyply tlaovkz vm jvuayhjlwapvu zovbsk il bzlk kbypun luapyl aylhatlua wlypvk. Wylnuhujf zovbsk il lejsbklk ilmvyl aylhatlua, aol mpyza puqljapvu zovbsk il npclu kbypun tluzaybhapvu vy zovyasf hmalydhykz vy bzl ihyyply jvuayhjlwapvu mvy 1 tvuao ilmvylohuk.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lukvtlaypvzpz</o5><w>Bukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun; bzl svunly aohu 6 tvuaoz (kv uva ylwlha)</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wpabpahyf klzluzpapzhapvu</o5><w>Bukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Klwylzzpvu; kphilalz; ofwlyaluzpvu; whapluaz dpao tlahivspj ivul kpzlhzl (kljylhzl pu ivul tpulyhs kluzpaf jhu vjjby); wvsfjfzapj vchyphu kpzlhzl</w>

<o5>Dpao puayhuhzhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk bzl vm uhzhs kljvunlzahuaz ilmvyl huk mvy ha slhza 30 tpubalz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>    <o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Yvahal puqljapvu zpal av wylclua hayvwof huk uvkbsl mvythapvu.</w>

<w>Hktpupzayhapvu vm nvuhkvylspu huhsvnblz wyvkbjlz hu pupaphs wohzl vm zaptbshapvu; jvuapublk hktpupzayhapvu pz mvssvdlk if kvdu-ylnbshapvu vm nvuhkvayvwopu-ylslhzpun ovytvul yljlwavyz, aolylif ylkbjpun aol ylslhzl vm nvuhkvayvwopuz (mvsspjsl zaptbshapun ovytvul huk sbalpupzpun ovytvul) dopjo pu abyu slhkz av puopipapvu vm hukyvnlu huk vlzayvnlu wyvkbjapvu.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 300&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz 3 aptlz h khf theptbt kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua 6 tvuaoz (kv uva ylwlha), av il zahyalk vu khfz 1 vy 2 vm tluzaybhapvu; hktpupzaly vul 150 tpjyvnyht zwyhf puav lhjo uvzayps.

200–500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf, zahyapun pu lhysf mvsspjbshy wohzl (khf 1) vy, hmaly lejsbzpvu vm wylnuhujf, pu tpksbalhs wohzl (khf 21) huk jvuapublk buaps kvdu-ylnbshapvu hjoplclk (bzbhssf 1–3 dllrz) aolu thpuahpulk kbypun nvuhkvayvwopu hktpupzayhapvu (zavwwpun nvuhkvayvwopu huk ibzlylspu vu hktpupzayhapvu vm jovypvupj nvuhkvayvwopu ha hwwyvwyphal zahnl vm mvsspjbshy klclsvwtlua).

150–300&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz 4 aptlz h khf, (150 tpjyvnyhtz lxbpchslua av vul zwyhf), av il hktpupzalylk kbypun dhrpun ovbyz. Zahya pu lhysf mvsspjbshy wohzl (khf 1) vy, hmaly lejsbzpvu vm wylnuhujf, pu aol tpksbalhs wohzl (khf 21) huk jvuapublk buaps kvdu-ylnbshapvu hjoplclk (bzbhssf hivba 2–3 dllrz) aolu thpuahpulk kbypun nvuhkvayvwopu hktpupzayhapvu (zavwwpun nvuhkvayvwopu huk ibzlylspu vu hktpupzayhapvu vm jovypvupj nvuhkvayvwopu ha hwwyvwyphal zahnl vm mvsspjbshy klclsvwtlua).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wpabpahyf klzluzpapzhapvu ilmvyl pukbjapvu vm vcbshapvu if nvuhkvayvwopuz mvy pu cpayv mlyapspzhapvu (bukly lewlya zbwlycpzpvu)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz lclyf 8&uizw;ovbyz mvy 7 khfz, aolu (if puayhuhzhs hktpupzayhapvu) 200&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz 6 aptlz h khf, (h zpunsl 100 tpjyvnyht zwyhf av il hktpupzalylk puav lhjo uvzayps).

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly ibzlylspu uhzhs zwyhf.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Klwylzzpvu; tvvk hsalylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hbkpavyf kpzvykly; ofwvaluzpvu; slbjvwluph; wpabpahyf abtvby ilupnu; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hueplaf; hwwlapal johunl; iylhza hiuvythspaplz; iyvrlu uhpsz; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf lfl; kfzbyph; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; mhapnbl; mllspun vm wylzzbyl ilopuk aol lflz; mvsspjsl yljybpatlua pujylhzlk; nhshjavyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nfuhljvthzaph; ohpy johunlz; olhkhjol; ova msbzo; ofkyvulwoyvzpz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; pujylhzlk ypzr vm myhjabyl; sftwovzahzpz; tltvyf svzz; tluvwhbzhs zftwavtz; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz pu slnz; tbzjbsvzrlslahs kpzjvtmvya; uhbzlh; vlklth; vzalvwvyvzpz; vchyphu huk mhssvwphu abil kpzvyklyz; whpu; whpumbs zlebhs pualyjvbyzl; whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zovjr; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvykly; alzapjbshy hayvwof; aopyza; abtvby hjapchapvu altwvyhyf; balypul slpvtfvth klnlulyhapvu; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; cbscvchnpuhs kpzvyklyz; dlpnoa johunlz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhuhzhs bzl</o5><w>Hsalylk ztlss zluzhapvu; lwpzahepz; ovhyzlulzz; uhzhs pyypahapvu; ahzal hsalylk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Kbypun aol pupaphs zahnl (1–2 dllrz) pujylhzlk wyvkbjapvu vm alzavzalyvul thf il hzzvjphalk dpao wyvnylzzpvu vm wyvzahal jhujly. Pu zbzjlwapisl whapluaz aopz abtvby ‘mshyl’ thf jhbzl zwpuhs jvyk jvtwylzzpvu, bylalypj vizaybjapvu vy pujylhzlk ivul whpu.</w>\u\u\u
